content.html: In general, whether people are paid for their efforts or not, give feedback and criticism with respect and kindness. We are all humans just trying to do our best. Offering help as well as feedback may also be welcomed in certain cases.
content.value:
In general, whether people are paid for their efforts or not, give feedback and criticism with respect and kindness. 

We are all humans just trying to do our best.

Offering help as well as feedback may also be welcomed in certain cases.
